noteText: Customer called about delayed delivery. Shipment stuck at distribution center. Offered 10% discount on next order.
Customer requesting bulk order pricing for 50 wireless mice for their company. Forwarded to sales team.
Wrong item shipped - received USB-C Hub instead of Webcam HD. Return initiated, correct item being sent.
Package appears lost in transit. UPS tracking shows no updates for 5 days. Filing claim with carrier.
Customer reported one USB-C Hub port not functioning. Initiated return for defective unit. Replacement being shipped.
VIP customer - 4th order this year. Added to loyalty program. Customer very happy with product quality.
Ring Light tripod arrived with broken leg. Customer sent photos. Sending replacement tripod only (not full unit).
Customer wants to return footrest - doesn't fit under her specific desk model. Return approved per 30-day policy.
Shipping delayed due to carrier backlog. Customer informed and offered free expedited shipping on next order.
Customer returning headphone stand - decided they don't need it. Keeping the Noise Cancelling Headphones. Easy return.
Desk Lamp LED USB port failed after 2 weeks. This is the 3rd report of this issue for this product. Escalated to product team.
Customer asked about compatibility between Mechanical Keyboard and Keycap Set. Confirmed compatible. Customer placed order.
Ergonomic Chair Cushion gel layer leaked. Quality issue - sending replacement and flagging for QA review.
Customer unhappy with keycap colors - says they look different from website photos. Product team reviewing listing images.
Screen Cleaning Kit spray bottle leaked in box. Third such report this month. Working with supplier on packaging fix.
Customer called to compliment Standing Desk Mat. Asked if we sell standing desks too. Added to product request list.
Customer wants to return 2 of 4 HDMI cables - ordered too many by mistake. Partial return processed.
Replacement Ear Pads don't fit customer's specific headphone model. Investigating compatibility chart accuracy.
Order of 5 Cable Organizers still processing - warehouse backlog. Expediting and updating customer daily.
Ring Light flickering at max brightness. Known issue from batch #2025-02. Product recall in discussion.
Customer inquired about Monitor Arm weight capacity for 34-inch ultrawide. Confirmed it supports up to 32 inches only. Customer decided not to order.
Laptop Sleeve zipper broke on first use. Second quality complaint for this product this month. Flagging for supplier review.
Pen Holder arrived cracked. Fragile item shipping procedure needs review. Sending replacement with extra padding.
Payment pending for Keycap Set order. Customer's card declined. Contacted customer to update payment method.
Customer returning footrest - massage surface too rough. Second footrest return this week. Adding to product improvement backlog.
Payment pending for Noise Cancelling Headphones. Customer wants to switch to PayPal. Processing payment method change.
Customer returning Monitor Stand from combo order but keeping Monitor Arm. Partial return processed.
Received 3 Cable Organizers instead of 4. Warehouse count discrepancy. Sending additional unit at no charge.
All 3 HDMI cables defective - no video signal. This is from a suspected bad batch. Pulling batch from inventory for testing.
Payment still pending for Webcam HD. Following up with customer. Order will be cancelled if payment not received by end of week.
